# nxos_feature_sflow (Data Source)

This data source can read the sFlow feature configuration.

- API Documentation: [fmSflow](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-2-2/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Sflow/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_feature_sflow" "example" {
}
```
